DELETE [SELECT ID FROM JBCXM__UIViews__c Where JBCXM__SectionId__r.Name IN ('Gainsight-Tasks')];
DELETE [SELECT ID FROM JBCXM__C360Sections__c Where Name IN ('Gainsight-Tasks')];
List<JBCXM__CSTask__c> ctList  = [SELECT ID FROM JBCXM__CSTask__c LIMIT 1];
String objectId = String.valueOf(ctList.get(0).Id).substring(0,3);
JBCXM__C360Sections__c c360Sec1 = new JBCXM__C360Sections__c(JBCXM__AccountReference__c = 'JBCXM__Account__c',
															JBCXM__DisplayOrder__c = 12,
															Name = 'Gainsight-Tasks',
															 JBCXM__DisplayLabel__c = 'Gainsight-Tasks',
															 JBCXM__IsActive__c = true,
															 JBCXM__isStandardObject__c = false,
															 JBCXM__InCustomer360__c = true,
                                                             JBCXM__InAccountWidget__c = true,
                                                             JBCXM__InOpportunityWidget__c = true,
                                                             JBCXM__ObjectId__c = objectId,
															 JBCXM__ObjectName__c = 'JBCXM__CSTask__c',
															 JBCXM__Type__c = 'RelatedList');
insert c360Sec1;
JBCXM__UIViews__c uView4 = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(JBCXM__ColumnList__c = '[{"name":"JBCXM__Account__r.Name","label":"Account","displayOrder":1,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Subject__c","label":"Subject","displayOrder":2,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Assigned__r.Name","label":"Assigned","displayOrder":3,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Date__c","label":"Date","displayOrder":4,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"DATE","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Priority__c","label":"Priority","displayOrder":5,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"PICKLIST","isGroupable":true},{"name":"Name","label":"Related Object","displayOrder":6,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Status__c","label":"Status","displayOrder":7,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"PICKLIST","isGroupable":true}]' ,
													JBCXM__FilterConditions__c = '[]',
													JBCXM__Visibility__c = 'Public',
													JBCXM__SectionId__c = c360Sec1.Id,
													Name = 'All Tasks',
                                                 	JBCXM__IsShown__c=true,
                                                    JBCXM__VisualType__c='List',
                                                   	JBCXM__UITabName__c = String.valueOf(c360Sec1.Id).subString(0,15));

JBCXM__UIViews__c uView5 = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(JBCXM__ColumnList__c='[{"name":"JBCXM__Account__r.Name","label":"Account","displayOrder":1,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Subject__c","label":"Subject","displayOrder":2,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Assigned__r.Name","label":"Assigned","displayOrder":3,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"USERLOOKUP","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Date__c","label":"Date","displayOrder":4,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"DATE","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Priority__c","label":"Priority","displayOrder":5,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"PICKLIST","isGroupable":true},{"name":"JBCXM__Status__c","label":"Status","displayOrder":6,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"PICKLIST","isGroupable":true}]',
                                                    JBCXM__FilterConditions__c = '[{"name":"JBCXM__Priority__c","value":"(\'High\',\'Normal\')","objectName":"CSTask__c","fieldType":"PICKLIST","operator":"u"}]',
                                                    JBCXM__Visibility__c='Public',
                                                    JBCXM__SectionId__c = c360Sec1.Id,
                                                    Name='High  & Normal Priority Tasks',
                                                    JBCXM__IsShown__c=true,
                                                    JBCXM__VisualType__c='List',
                                                    JBCXM__UITabName__c = String.valueOf(c360Sec1.Id).subString(0,15));
insert uView4;
insert uView5;
//This is end Line.
